Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.base

Class BaseDriverProvider<T extends org.openqa.selenium.remote.AbstractDriverOptions<?>>

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.base.BaseDriverProvider<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
DriverProvider<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChromeDriverProvider, EdgeDriverProvider
public abstract class BaseDriverProvider<T extends org.openqa.selenium.remote.AbstractDriverOptions<?>> extends Object implements DriverProvider<T>
Abstract base class for managing WebDriver setup and configuration.

This class provides a mechanism to ensure that WebDriver binaries are downloaded only once per driver type, avoiding redundant downloads across multiple test sessions.

It utilizes a thread-safe ConcurrentHashMap to track which drivers have been downloaded.

The generic type T represents a specific browser configuration extending AbstractDriverOptions. Implementations of this class must define the WebDriver options corresponding to a particular browser.

  • Method Details

    • getDriverType

      protected abstract String getDriverType()
      Retrieves the type of WebDriver that this provider supports.
      Returns:
      A String representing the WebDriver type (e.g., "CHROME", "FIREFOX").

    • setupDriver

      public void setupDriver(String version)
      Sets up the WebDriver by downloading the necessary driver binary if it has not already been downloaded.

      This method ensures that each driver type is downloaded only once by utilizing ConcurrentHashMap.computeIfAbsent(Object, java.util.function.Function) to prevent duplicate downloads.

      Specified by:
      setupDriver in interface DriverProvider<T extends org.openqa.selenium.remote.AbstractDriverOptions<?>>
      Parameters:
      version - The specific WebDriver version to download.
